entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
